channel.title: Grafana on Jeongseup Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Grafana on Jeongseup Blog

item.title: CVMS (Cosmos Validator Monitoring Service)
item.description:
Role

Lead Developer

Description

An open-source monitoring tool designed for Cosmos-SDK validator nodes. It provides real-time metrics and alerts to ensure node stability and performance.

Tech Stack

  • Go
  • Prometheus
  • Grafana

item.title: [Grafana Mimir] Update Play-with-Mimir Documentation
item.description:
Contribution Description

Updated the index.md in the play-with-grafana-mimir documentation to improve clarity and accuracy. Small documentation fixes to help new users better understand the setup process.
